description.narrative: To strengthen the advocacy capacity of WHO office in the oPt to tackle health related issues through: (1) Working closely with the health cluster, OCHA , PRCS, UNRWA and other agencies to pursue a common advocacy strategy on health issues. (2) Investing in the production and dissemination of high quality reports on the health situation and on particular topics relevant to the advocacy activities of WHO. (3) Providing regular reports on the health sector for OCHA’s protection of civilians monitor. (4) Ensuring that key issues are raised and reported at relevant meetings and forums: e.g. the UNCT, HCT, Health Sector Working Group, meetings with health stakeholders and donors. (5) Pursuing discussions with relevant authorities (e.g. COGAT, Israeli Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Palestinian MoH) to address issues of concern and discuss solutions. (6) Issuing press releases and contact the media where appropriate with particular attention for opportunities to influence opinion in Israeli civil society.
